Summary: pulsing orb lilting kinda like a leaf
divs: sighting detailsi 81 bumper to bumper 75 mph gyroscopically pulsing orb unnatural fluttering towards ground saw object for only 5 sec. was terrified for hours i could tell it was something unnatural weird start\stop fluid but jerky landing i started screaming, looking at other drivers no one else seemed to notice will get back with exact date (my friend got married that day)
